description.value: This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Slam attack modifier = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Slam damage = 2d12+3 + the spellcaster's spellcasting ability modifier.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Slam attack modifier = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Slam damage = 2d6+3 + the spellcaster's spellcasting ability modifier.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Slam attack modifier = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Your' refers to the Beast Master's statistics. Armor Class = 13 plus your Wisdom modifier. Hit Points = 5 + (5 times your ranger levels). Hit Dice = a number of d8s equal to your ranger level. Languages: Understands the languages you know. PB = your proficiency bonus. Primal Bond: Add your proficiency bonus to every ability check and saving throw the beast makes. Beast's Strike: Attack modifier = your spell attack modifier. Damage= 1d8+2 plus your Wisdom modifier (piercing, slashing, or bludgeoning, chosen when you summon the beast.)
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

If the beast moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target before the hit, the target takes an extra [[1d6]] (1d6) damage of the same type, The target has the Prone condition if it is a Large or smaller creature.

types: plus your wisdom modifier bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing (your choice when you summon the beast)

description.value: This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Your' refers to the Beast Master's statistics. Armor Class = 13 plus your Wisdom modifier. Hit Points = 5 + (5 times your ranger levels). Hit Dice = a number of d8s equal to your ranger level. Languages: Understands the languages you know. PB = your proficiency bonus. Primal Bond: Add your proficiency bonus to every ability check and saving throw the beast makes. Beast's Strike: Attack modifier = your spell attack modifier. Damage= 1d8+2 plus your Wisdom modifier (piercing or bludgeoning, chosen when you summon the beast.) Escape DC = your spell save DC.
The beast can breathe air and water.
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.
The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC equals your spell save DC.)

types: plus your wisdom modifier bludgeoning or piercing (your choice when you summon the beast)

description.value: This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Your' refers to the Beast Master's statistics. Armor Class = 13 plus your Wisdom modifier. Hit Points = 4 + (4 times your ranger levels). Hit Dice = a number of d6s equal to your ranger level. Languages: Understands the languages you know. PB = your proficiency bonus. Primal Bond: Add your proficiency bonus to every ability check and saving throw the beast makes. Beast's Strike: Attack modifier = your spell attack modifier. Damage= 1d4+3 plus your Wisdom modifier.
The beast doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Summon Beast spell. Decide which version of spirit it is (Air, Land, or Water) and delete any that are not appropriate. AC = 11 + spell level. Hit Points: Start with 20 for Air or 30 for Land and Water. Add 5 for each spell level above 2. Understands the caster's languages. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Multiattack: a number of attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down). Rend: Attack modifier = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d8 + 4 + spell level.
The spirit doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
The spirit has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the spirit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
The spirit can breathe only underwater.
The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down)
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

languages.custom: Draconic, understands the languages you know

description.value: This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Summon Dragon spell. AC = 14 + spell level. Hit Points = 50 + 10 for each spell level above 5. Understands the caster's languages and Draconic. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. You have Resistance to the chosen type until the spell ends. Multiattack: a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down) and Breath Weapon. Rend: Attack modifier = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d6 + 4 + spell level. Breath Weapon: DC equals your spell save DC. Damage type is chosen when you cast the spell.
When you summon the spirit, choose one of its Resistances. You have Resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.
The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down), and it uses Breath Weapon.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

*Dexterity Saving Throw*: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[2d6]] (2d6) damage of a type this spirit has Resistance to (your choice when you cast the spell). *Success*: Half damage.

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Summon Fiend spell. Decide which version of spirit it is (Demon, Devil, or Yugoloth) and delete any that are not appropriate. AC = 12 + spell level. Hit Points = 50 (Demon), 40 (Devil) or 60 (Yugoloth) + 15 for each spell level above 6. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Death Throes: DC equals your spell save DC. Damage = 2d10 plus spell level. Multiattack: a number of attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down). Bite: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d12 + 3 + spell level. Claws: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d8 + 3 + spell level. Fiery Strike: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 2d6 + 3 + spell level.

When the spirit drops to 0 Hit Points or the spell ends, the spirit explodes. *Dexterity Saving Throw*: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. *Failure*: [[2d10]] (2d10) plus this spell's level Fire damage. *Success*: Half damage.
Magical Darkness doesn't impede the spirit's Darkvision.
The spirit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the spirit can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Giant Insect spell. Decide which version of spirit it is (Centipede, Spider, or Wasp) and delete any that are not appropriate. Armor Class= 11 + spell level. Hit Points = 30 + (10 times the spell level). Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Multiattack: The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down). Poison Jab: Attack bonus = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level Piercing damage, plus 1d4 Poison damage. Web Bolt: Attack bonus = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level. Venomous Spew: Saving Throw DC = the spellcaster's spell save DC.
The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
The target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn.
*Constitution Saving Throw*: Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. *Failure*: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the insect's next turn.
The seahorse can breathe only underwater.
The seahorse deals 11 (or [[2d8 + 2]] (2d8 + 2)) Bludgeoning damage if it moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.
While underwater, the seahorse moves up to half its Swim Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Find Steed spell. Decide which version of spirit it is (Celestial, Fey, or Fiend) and delete any options that are not appropriate. Armor Class= 10 + spell level. Hit Points = 5 + (10 times the spell level). Hit Dice = a number of d10s equal to the spell level. The steed can fly if the spell level is 4 or higher. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Otherworldly Slam: Attack bonus = the spellcaster's spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d8 + spell level. Fell Glare Saving Throw DC = Spellcaster's spell save DC. Healing Touch = 2d8 + spell level.
When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

types: plus the spell's level of radiant (celestial), psychic (fey), or necrotic (fiend) damage

items.name: Fell Glare (Fiend Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)

description.value: *Wisdom Saving Throw*: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. *Failure*: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Fey Step (Fey Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)

description.value: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

items.name: Healing Touch (Celestial Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)

description.value: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to [[2d8]] (2d8) plus the spell's level.

This stat block requires user edits for full functionality. Please use this list to ensure all edits are made appropriately for full effect. 'Spell level' refers to the level of the spell slot used to cast the Summon Undead spell. Decide which version of spirit it is (Ghostly, Putrid, or Skeletal) and delete any that are not appropriate. AC = 11 + spell level. Hit Points = 30 (Ghostly or Putrid) or 20 (Skeletal) + 10 for each spell level above 3. Understands the caster's languages. Proficiency Bonus = the spellcaster's total proficiency bonus. Festering Aura: DC equals your spell save DC. Multiattack: a number of attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down). Deathly Touch: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d8 + 3 + spell level. Grave Bolt: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 2d4 + 3 + spell level. Rotting Claw: Attack bonus = spell attack modifier. Damage = 1d6 + 3 + spell level.

*Constitution Saving Throw*: DC equals your spell save DC, any creature (other than you) that starts its turn within a 5-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. *Failure*: The creature has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn.

The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes [[1d10]] (1d10) Force damage for every 5 feet traveled.
The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).
The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
If the target has the Poisoned condition, it has the Paralyzed condition until the end of its next turn.
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
